This torrent works folks!

This game is awesome! By far the simplest torrent I've downloaded. Just click on setup and sla-kow! You'll be playing Manhunt in no time! 

Here's a quick review. 

Firstly, this game is creepy as hell. That just means it has it's moments where you will feel your heart jump up to your throat. For example, you can be walking behind a hunter ready to stab a shard of glass in his face when all of a sudden one of his buddies sees you. The music gets louder and the chase is on until you can hide into the shadows again.

It isn't difficult as much as it's suspenseful. I take that back, it can be both really. Just some levels are different from others. Born Again is probably the best level.

The graphics are fine. It's more or less Vice City's graphics just in a darker setting and with different animations and whatnot. The "Noise FX" adds to the game's atmosphere by making it look like you're on camera at all time. Which you are! How else does Starkweather film your kills? :)

Play this game at night, all the lights OFF, with some good gaming headphones on to FULLY get the Manhunt experience.

I will seed forever!
